rule-1-3-a.test_description: A one building segment, single zone building in has the correct relationships between PCIt, BPF, BBREC, BBUEC, and BBP. RESULT: pass

standard.rule_description: The Performance Cost Index-Target (PCIt) shall be calculated using the procedures defined in Section 4.2.1.1. The PCIt shall be equal to baseline building unregulated energy cost (BBUEC) + BPF x baseline building regulated energy cost (BBREC)/ BBP

rule-1-3-b.test_description: A one building segment, single zone building in has an incorrect relationship between PCIt, BPF, BBREC, BBUEC, and BBP. RESULT: fail

standard.rule_description: The Performance Cost Index-Target (PCIt) shall be calculated using the procedures defined in Section 4.2.1.1. The PCIt shall be equal to baseline building unregulated energy cost (BBUEC) + BPF x baseline building regulated energy cost (BBREC)/ BBP

rule-1-3-c.test_description: A one building segment, single zone building in has the correct relationships between PCIt, BPF, BBREC, BBUEC, and BBP but has different values between RMDs. RESULT: fail

standard.rule_description: The Performance Cost Index-Target (PCIt) shall be calculated using the procedures defined in Section 4.2.1.1. The PCIt shall be equal to baseline building unregulated energy cost (BBUEC) + BPF x baseline building regulated energy cost (BBREC)/ BBP
